title: Anyone who knows this font?
content:
Hello

Can anyone identify this font?

Thx!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Schermafbeelding 2014-03-25 om 08.47.17.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803033517/http:/typophile.com/files/Schermafbeelding%202014-03-25%20om%2008.47.17.png) | 16.19 KB |
author: Idiosyn

comments.content:
A lot of font names but probably all clones (not the original font), so be careful before using them in any commercial project:

**[Faktos](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803033517/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Faktos%20-%20Regular&fid=a72d00d0a85bfadeb1a43d74252c9374&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Motorcycle%20Battery&wrap=2)** - Typographer Mediengestaltung, 2000  
**AgateSSK** - Copyright 1995 Southern Software, Inc  
**Narbonne** - (C) 1994 Brendel Informatik GmbH  
**Stare 1 / Stare 5 / Droyer 1** - Cambridge Fontworks  
**FZ BASIC 5** - Copyright (c) 1994 By Fantazia Concepts Inc

The original was Faktos by [Cory Maylett](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803033517/http:/luc.devroye.org/fonts-30622.html), 1991. It was a postscript font. Dieter Steffmann probably did the conversion to Truetype.
